alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 31 at 10:42PM CDT until April 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Dickinson County. In Minnesota, Nobles and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
